bike.description: S-Works Stumpjumper FSR FACT 10m carbon main triangle, Az1 construction, M5 alloy chainstays with Brain mount, FACT 10m carbon seatstays with carbon drive side dropout, DMD Direct Mount F.Der, full cartridge bearing pivots, 120mm travel

components.description: Specialized AFR Brain Shock w/ remote Trail Tune inertia valve, rebound adj. and Brain Fade, 7.25x1.75"
Specialized Future Shock S120, 120mm travel, single sided air spring and damper, Trail Tune, Brain Fade, rebound adj., carbon 1-1/8" to 1.5" steerer
1-1/8" to 1.5" Threadless, Campy style, cartridge bearing
Shimano M971 XTR, DMD, top swing, dual pull
S-Works Carbon 30.9mm, single-bolt head, S: 300mm M: 350mm, L/XL: 400mm
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 36.9mm clamp ID, for carbon frame black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
